text:
**Final Match Details**:
The final match of MLC 2024 will be played between Washington Freedom and San Francisco Unicorns on July 29 at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas.

**Match Schedule**:
The match is scheduled to start at 6 AM India Standard Time (IST), which is 7:30 PM local time. The coin toss will take place at 5:30 AM IST.

**TV Telecast and Live Stream**:
The match will be telecast on Sony Sports Network (Sony Sports Ten 1 SF & HD and Sony Sports Ten 5 SD and HD channels) in India. Fans can also watch the match through a free live stream on the Jio Cinema app or website.

**Team Performance**: Both Washington Freedom and San Francisco Unicorns finished top two in the points table with 11 points each, having lost just one match each in the tournament.

* The San Francisco Unicorns have qualified for the title clash with the Washington Freedom after defeating the Texas Super Kings by 10 runs in their match at the Grand Prairie Stadium.
* Finn Allen's century (101 off 53 balls) helped the Unicorns post a challenging total of 200/6, which the Super Kings failed to chase down, scoring 190/4 in 20 overs.
* The Texas Super Kings will now face the Washington Freedom on Sunday, according to the MLC press release.
* Notable performances in the match included Devon Conway's 62* and Joshua Tromp's 56 for the Texas Super Kings, while Hassan Khan's 27 off 15 balls was crucial for the Unicorns.
* The match was closely contested, with the Super Kings needing 64 runs in the last five overs, but the Unicorns' bowlers, particularly Pat Cummins and Haris Rauf, held their nerve to secure the win.

* Washington Freedom has qualified for the finals of the Major League Cricket tournament after defeating San Francisco Unicorns in the qualifier game.
* San Francisco Unicorns will play the Challenger game against Texas Super Kings on July 27, 2024, at 6 am IST (12.30 am GMT) for another chance to reach the finals.
* Washington Freedom's Travis Head was awarded the Player of the Match for his impressive batting performance.
* In the game, San Francisco Unicorns batted first and scored a total that was considered 20-30 runs short, according to their captain Corey Anderson. They lost 4 wickets in the first innings, with Rachin Ravindra taking 4 wickets for 11 runs.
* Washington Freedom's captain Steven Smith praised his team's performance, crediting Travis Head and Glenn Maxwell for their contributions.

* The Washington Freedom defeated the San Francisco Unicorns by 7 wickets in the Qualifier 1 match at Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas.
* The San Francisco Unicorns were bowled out for 145 in 19 overs, with Hassan Khan top-scoring with 57 off 36 balls.
* Rachin Ravindra took 4 wickets for 11 runs to help restrict the Unicorns.
* In response, the Washington Freedom chased down the target in 15.3 overs, thanks to unbeaten knocks from Travis Head (77* off 44) and Glenn Maxwell (54* off 23).
* With this win, the Washington Freedom became the first team to reach the final of the Cognizant Major League Cricket 2024.
* The San Francisco Unicorns will now face the Texas Super Kings in the Challenger for a place in the final.

In the qualifier match, Washington Freedom defeated San Francisco Unicorns by 7 wickets at Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas. San Francisco was bowled out for 145, with Rachin Ravindra taking 4/11. Travis Head scored an unbeaten 77 off 44 balls, including 10 fours and 3 sixes, to lead Washington to victory. Glenn Maxwell also contributed with 54 off 23 balls. With this win, Washington Freedom became the first team to reach the MLC finals, while San Francisco Unicorns will face Texas Super Kings in the Challenger to try to join them in the final.

**Match Details:** The match was played between the Texas Super Kings and the Seattle Orcas in the American-based MLC season.

**Key Moment:** The crucial moment in the match came when Kiwi all-rounder Mitchell Santner, playing for the Texas Super Kings, hit a giant six off Ali Sheikh's delivery in the 11th over, reminiscent of Suresh Raina's famous shot. This shot was a much-needed relief for the Super Kings, who were struggling against the Orcas' bowling attack.

**Texas Super Kings' Struggle:** The Super Kings faced trouble on the field, collapsing to 12/2 by the end of the second over. Despite Faf du Plessis' efforts to stabilize the innings, wickets continued to fall, leaving the team in disarray.

**Mitchell Santner's Impact:** Santner's knock was the only bright spark for the Super Kings, showcasing his composure and accuracy. His ability to embody the spirit of Suresh Raina, a Super Kings' legend, established his worth within the lineup and provided a rare moment of excitement in an otherwise struggling innings.

**Significance:** Although the match result did not significantly impact the teams' positions, Santner's innings highlighted the best virtues of the Texas Super Kings and provided a memorable moment in the tournament.

**Match Details**

* Match 24 (Challenger) between Texas Super Kings and San Francisco Unicorns will be played on July 26th at the Grand Prairie Stadium, Texas.

**Texas Super Kings**

* Current form: Won the Eliminator match against MI New York, will face San Francisco Unicorns in the Challenger match.
* Top run scorer: Faf du Plessis with 375 runs.
* Top wicket taker: Marcus Stoinis with 8 scalps.
* Recent performance: Restricted MI New York to 163/8 in 20 overs, then chased down the target comfortably with 9 wickets in hand, thanks to Devon Conway (51), Faf du Plessis (72), and Aaron Hardie (40*).

**San Francisco Unicorns**

* Current form: Lost the first Qualifier match against Washington Freedom, will face Texas Super Kings in the Challenger match.
* Top run scorer: Finn Allen with 192 runs.
* Top wicket taker: Hassan Khan with 8 scalps.
* Recent performance: Batted first and were bowled out for 145, with Hassan Khan scoring 57 runs. Lost to Washington Freedom, despite a valiant effort from Hassan Khan, as Travis Head (77) and Glenn Maxwell (54) helped Washington Freedom win with 7 wickets in hand.

* 4th wicket fell at 1 run in 9.5 overs (Marcus Stoinis out)

* San Francisco Unicorns came second in the standings with the same 11 points.

**Pitch Report:**

* The pitch is expected to be batting-friendly, with batters showing no nerves during their stay.

**Probable Winners:**

* Washington Freedom are expected to win this match.

**Probable Playing XIs:**

* Washington Freedom: Travis Head, Steven Smith, Andries Gous (wk), Rachin Ravindra, Glenn Maxwell, Obus Pienaar, Mukhtar Ahmed, Marco Jansen, Lockie Ferguson / Andrew Tye, Saurabh Netravalkar, Jasdeep Singh.
* San Francisco Unicorns: Finn Allen, Matthew Short, Sanjay Krishnamurthy, Josh Inglis (wk), Sherfane Rutherford, Corey Anderson (c), Hassan Khan, Pat Cummins, Haris Rauf, Carmi le Roux, Liam Plunkett / Brody Couch.

**Match Details:**
The Challenger match of the Major League Cricket 2024 will be played between San Francisco Unicorns and Texas Super Kings on July 27th at 6:00 AM IST at the Grand Prairie Stadium, Dallas. The match will be live-streamed on Sony Sports Network and JioCinema.

**Recent Form:**
San Francisco Unicorns have lost their recent match against Washington Freedom in the Qualifier, while Texas Super Kings won their Eliminator match against MI New York.

**Pitch Report:**
The pitch is expected to be balanced, with the surface appearing better for batting in the second half of the innings.

**Probable Winners:**
Texas Super Kings are expected to win this match.

**Probable Playing XIs:**
The probable playing XIs for both teams have been listed in the article.

**Fantasy Cricket Picks:**
The top picks for fantasy cricket teams include Faf du Plessis (batter), Marcus Stoinis (all-rounder), Noor Ahmad (bowler), and Devon Conway (wicketkeeper). Two suggested fantasy teams have also been provided.

**Pre-Match Analysis:**
San Francisco Unicorns were disappointed with their batting display in the Qualifier against Washington Freedom and will need to improve to qualify for the Finals. All eyes will be on Pat Cummins, who has only 2 wickets to his name in the tournament.

* The Major League Cricket championship game is taking place on Sunday, July 28.
* The teams playing in the final have not been decided yet, but the Texas Super Kings may be competing for the title.
* The teams will be announced after the qualifier game between the Washington Freedom and San Francisco Unicorns on Thursday, and the challenger game between the qualifier loser and the Texas Super Kings on Friday.
* The match will be played at Grand Prairie Stadium at 7:30 p.m.
* Gates will open 75 minutes before the game starts, and parking is available onsite starting at $20.
* Tickets start at $30.
* Cricket 101 flyers will be available at the stadium to explain how the game is played for attendees new to the sport.
* Major League Cricket is the United States' first professional T20 Cricket league, and this is only its second season.

**Match Details**

* Teams: Texas Super Kings vs San Francisco Unicorns
* Date: Saturday, July 27
* Venue: Grand Prairie Stadium, Dallas
* Time: 6:00 AM IST (Indian Standard Time)

**Viewing Options**

* TV: Sony Sports Ten 5
* Online Streaming: JioCinema app and website (free)

**Background**

* San Francisco Unicorns lost to Washington Freedom in the qualifier and are seeking to book a spot in the final.
* Texas Super Kings are in good form, having defeated defending champions MI New York in their last match.

**Match Summary:** San Francisco Unicorns (SFU) defeated Texas Super Kings (TSK) by 10 runs to reach the MLC 2024 final.

**Key Performances:**

* Finn Allen scored an impressive 101 for SFU.
* Hassan Khan contributed 27 off 15 and took 1 wicket for 25 runs.
* Juanoy Drysdale took 2 wickets for 33 runs.
* Devon Conway and Joshua Tromp staged a late fightback for TSK, but fell short.

**Match Details:**

* SFU batted first and scored 200 for 6, with Allen reaching his century.
* TSK came close but fell short, with Conway and Tromp's late push not enough to secure a win.
* Pat Cummins held his nerve in the final over, conceding only 7 runs to ensure SFU's win.

**Next Match:** SFU will face Washington Freedom in the MLC 2024 final on July 28.

**Match Result:** San Francisco Unicorns won by 10 runs against the Texas Super Kings at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Texas.

**Scorecard:** San Francisco Unicorns scored 200/6 in 20 overs, while the Texas Super Kings managed 190/4 in 20 overs.

**Key Performances:**

* Finn Allen scored a vital 101 off 53 balls, including nine boundaries and five sixes, to set the stage for the Unicorns' win.
* Devon Conway scored 62* off 38 balls for the Texas Super Kings, while Joshua Tromp contributed a breezy 56 from 36 balls.
* Noor Ahmad was the standout bowler for the Texas Super Kings, capturing key wickets and finishing with figures of 3/27.
* Haris Rauf and Pat Cummins held their nerves for the San Francisco Unicorns, delivering tight overs under pressure to secure the win.

**Next Match:** The Texas Super Kings will face the Washington Freedom on Sunday.

* The Challenger match of the Major League Cricket 2024 will be played between San Francisco Unicorns (SF) and Texas Super Kings (TEX) on July 27 at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas.
* The winner of this match will join Washington Freedom in the final on July 29. Washington Freedom had already reached the final by defeating San Francisco Unicorns in the Qualifier by seven wickets.
* Texas Super Kings defeated defending champions MI New York in the Eliminator by nine wickets to reach the Challenger.
* The pitch at Grand Prairie Stadium is expected to favor batters, but slow outfield may require more power than timing. Pacers may have an advantage due to early movement.
* San Francisco Unicorns finished second in the points table with five wins in seven league games, earning them a second chance to win the title.
* Faf du Plessis of Texas Super Kings is the top scorer of the league with 375 runs in seven games at an average of 53.57 and is expected to be the probable best batter in the Challenger match.
* Marcus Stoinis of Texas Super Kings is expected to be the probable best bowler, having delivered well in the Eliminator with figures of 2/18.

In a recent match of Major League Cricket 2024, Corey Anderson made a spectacular one-handed catch of Faf du Plessis in the San Francisco Unicorns vs Texas Super Kings game. Earlier, San Francisco Unicorns scored 200/6 in 20 overs, thanks to Finn Allen's century (101 off 53 balls) and contributions from Josh Inglis (37 off 25 balls) and Hassan Khan (27 off 15 balls). Noor Ahmad was the top performer for Texas Super Kings, taking three wickets. Faf du Plessis scored 45 runs off 22 balls before being dismissed by Anderson's impressive catch.

* Gerald Coetzee, a South African pace sensation, picked up a side strain while playing for the Texas Super Kings, a Chennai Super Kings-based franchise, in the US-based T20 league named Major League Cricket.
* He has not yet recovered from the injury and will miss the tour to West Indies.

Note: There is no other information about the Major League Cricket tournament in the article beyond this. The rest of the article focuses on Coetzee's injury and its impact on the South African cricket team, as well as other unrelated cricket news.

**Match Details:**
The Challenger match of MLC 2024 will be played between San Francisco Unicorns and Texas Super Kings on July 26 at 7:30 pm local time (July 27, 12:30 am GMT/6:00 am IST) at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas.

**Pitch Report:**
The Grand Prairie Stadium pitch is expected to be exciting for both batters and bowlers. Fast bowlers may have an advantage early on, while spinners may shine later in the innings. Batters can score easily with well-executed shots.

**Teams:**
San Francisco Unicorns are the only team to have defeated current finalist Washington Freedom, while Texas Super Kings are a strong team that can challenge them.

**Squads:**
The article provides the squads for both San Francisco Unicorns and Texas Super Kings, which include players like Pat Cummins, Faf du Plessis, Marcus Stoinis, and Devon Conway.

**Dream11 Prediction:**
The article also provides Dream11 prediction picks, including captain and vice-captain choices, as well as backup players for the match.

**Match Result:** San Francisco Unicorns (SFU) defeated Texas Super Kings (TSK) by 10 runs in the Challenger match of the MLC 2024.

**Key Performances:**

* Finn Allen scored a century (101 off 53 balls) for SFU.
* Corey Anderson took a sensational one-handed catch to dismiss Faf du Plessis.
* Faf du Plessis scored 45 runs off 22 deliveries for TSK before being caught by Anderson.
* Devon Conway and Joshua Trump scored unbeaten half-centuries (62 off 38 balls and 56 off 36 balls respectively) for TSK.
* Juanoy Drysdale picked up two wickets for 33 runs in his four overs for SFU.

**Quotes:** SFU skipper Corey Anderson credited his team's win to crucial moments, including his spectacular catch and Juanoy Drysdale's performance.

**Next Match:** SFU will face Washington Freedom in the final game at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas on Monday, July 29 (IST).

**Match Result:** Washington Freedom won by 7 wickets against San Francisco Unicorns in the Qualifier of MLC 2024.

**Score:** San Francisco Unicorns scored 145 runs in 19 overs, while Washington Freedom chased it down with 7 wickets in hand and 3 balls to spare.

**Key Performances:**

* Glenn Maxwell delivered a match-winning performance, scoring a fifty and hitting a 103-meter six, the longest of the tournament, to turn the game in favor of Washington Freedom.
* Rachin Ravindra took 4 wickets for 11 runs to restrict San Francisco Unicorns' innings.
* Hassan Khan scored 57 runs for San Francisco Unicorns, but conceded the longest six of the tournament to Maxwell.

**Tournament Implications:** Washington Freedom advances to the final of MLC 2024, while San Francisco Unicorns are eliminated from the tournament.

**Final Match:** The final match of the MLC 2024 season will be played between Washington Freedom and San Francisco Unicorns on July 29 at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas.

**Teams' Performance:** Both teams have been dominant throughout the tournament, finishing with 11 points each and losing just one match apiece.

**Pitch and Weather:** The Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas is known for its batting-friendly pitch and fast outfield, and the weather is expected to be clear with no chances of rain interrupting the proceedings.

San Francisco Unicorns: Finn Allen, Jake Fraser-McGurk, Jahmar Hamilton, Josh Inglis, Sherfane Rutherford, Matthew Short, Corey Anderson, Pat Cummins, Haris Rauf, Hassan Khan, Matt Henry

**Dream11 Match Prediction:** According to the article, Washington Freedom is favored to win the game due to their stronger squad.

* Faf du Plessis, 40, is currently the best batter in the MLC 2024.
* He played well for the Texas Super Kings in MLC 2024 and was decent for the Joburg Super Kings in SA20 2024.
* Du Plessis' success in MLC 2024 could lead to interest from other franchises, including Chennai Super Kings and Punjab Kings, if he is released by Royal Challengers Bengaluru.
* Chennai Super Kings might be interested in re-signing du Plessis due to his past success with the franchise and his ability to pair well with Devon Conway, his opening partner for the Texas Super Kings.
* Punjab Kings might also target du Plessis due to his captaincy experience with St Lucia Kings in the CPL, which shares the same owners as Punjab Kings.
